data.contentText:
Mild = 36 - 36.4
Moderate = 32 - 35.9
Severe = < 32

Normal temperature range = 36.5 - 37.5

metadata.text1:
If oxygen is needed place on warmer or resuscitaire
- if baby is <1800g - warmer + intermittent KMC
- if baby is >1800g - warmer
If oxygen is not needed
- if baby is <1800g - KMC
- if baby is >1800g but <2500g - ambulatory KMC
metadata.text2:
- Make sure baby is dry 
- Put on a hat & wrap up the baby
- If on the resuscitaire put the sides up 
- The 4 ways by which a baby may lose heat are:
metadata.text3:
- Measure temperature every 15-30 minutes
- Watch out for over warming 
- Complete neotree asessment to assess for signs of infection, apnoea and hypoglycaemia

data.title: EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT
